node.address: Getsemani, calle San Andre #30-53 , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value: Casa Viena is located in Cartagena de Indias, a 5-minute drive from the walled centre. This guest house features a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen.
Each room here is air-conditioned and includes a cable TV and a private or shared bathroom with a shower and toilet. The property also offers economic dormitory rooms.
Guests can relax at the propertyâ€™s shared lounge or explore the surrounding area, with Parque del Centenario park situated less than 100 m away.
Plaza El Castillo shopping centre is a 10-minute walk from Casa Viena. Cartagena International Airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car.

description.description: Casa Viena has a team of highly qualified to provide a pleasant stay in our hostel. We work for our guests, we offer all types of Colombia general information, advice and recommendations to allow the passenger to continue his journey in our country and outside of it. The hostel staff give their best, that you have a comfortable and relaxed place to stay during the time while you are in Cartagena de Indias.
